start_address[31:0] = 0x80001000 = 0b10000000000000000001000000000000

size = 0x2000 = 2 power (13) --> 13 bits --> 0|1111111111|00 (to be removed as they are harwired) --> 01111111111(11 bits) --> 0x3FF

cfg = 00 | 1000000000000000000 | 01111111111 = 0010 0000 0000 0000 0000 0011 1111 1111 = 0x200003FF
